entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is playing Quidditch.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played by wizards and witches on broomsticks.

entities.name: irish chasers
entities.description: The Irish team's Chasers are described as superb and work well together.

entities.name: troy
entities.description: An Irish Chaser whose name is called out by the rosette on Harry's chest.

entities.name: mullet
entities.description: Another Irish Chaser whose name is called out by the rosette on Harry's chest.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: The third Irish Chaser whose name is called out by the rosette on Harry's chest.

entities.name: volkov
entities.description: A Bulgarian Beater who is whacking Bludgers at the Irish Chasers.

entities.name: vulchanov
entities.description: Another Bulgarian Beater who is whacking Bludgers at the Irish Chasers.

entities.name: bulgarian beaters
entities.description: The Bulgarian team's Beaters are described as whacking Bludgers fiercely.

relationships.description: The Irish Chasers are being targeted by the Bulgarian Beaters.
Troy is playing Quidditch as part of the Irish team.
Mullet is playing Quidditch as part of the Irish team.
Moran is playing Quidditch as part of the Irish team.
Volkov is a member of the Bulgarian Beaters.
Vulchanov is a member of the Bulgarian Beaters.
